Question: On 1 October 1500, this person and his two brothers, likewise in chains, were sent back to Spain.
Hints: On 5 December 1502, this person and his crew found themselves in a storm unlike any they had ever experienced.
The location of the Dominican remains is in "The ____ Lighthouse" (Faro a Colón), in Santo Domingo.
This person first sailed to the Canary Islands, which belonged to Castile, where he restocked the provisions and made repairs.
